name: Mind The Cubes
description:
A small little game made as my first venture into Unity and C# which I may have accidentally made very difficult 

This is mostly for me and a few friends, but feel free to download it and give it a try

It's been tested on as low-spec hardware as I could get my hands on, which is very low-spec so it should run on pretty much anything

Please note at this point it doesn't support arrow keys for input, as I am bad at C#, and can't work out how to implement them yet, so only AD for now
